name: jka-core
description: Library for working with Jedi Academy servers
author: TrayHard <wwwtrayfrost@gmail.com> (https://github.com/TrayHard)

scripts.update:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && git push origin --tags
scripts.update:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish && git push origin --tags
scripts.update:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish && git push origin --tags
